CustomField.description: Impact on Annual Subscription Value (ASV), if applicable, that is at stake with this alert. For example, if there is a "Downsell alert", enter the potential reduction in ASV if the alert is not proactively addressed.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Impact on Annual Subscription Value (ASV), if applicable, at stake with this alert. Example: for a "Downsell alert", enter potential reduction in ASV if the alert is not proactively addressed.
CustomField.label: Alert ASV
